work-item.field:
Artifacts (What and Engine)
  • Define the build type (shell, maven or ant)
  • Smallest buildable entity
  • Comprised of resources - usually source code and support files. Multiple build artifacts may share the same resources.
Descriptors (Where and Reporting)
  • Where to save the build results
  • What reports to execute
Work Item reports (What has been implemented)
  • Custom query which is executed on build execution
  • Report can be related to to other builds e.g. fixed since last build etc.
